Method Detail

onCreate

public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)

clickCash

public void clickCash(View view)
This is a method that runs when the Cash radio button is pressed. It will set the visibility of the credit card field to invisible

Parameters:
view -

clickCredit

public void clickCredit(View view)
This is a method that runs when the Credit Card radio button is pressed. It will set the visibility of the credit card field to visible

Parameters:
view -

verifyAddress

public boolean verifyAddress()
This method verifies all aspects of the user's address. It will get the street, city, state and zip-code and only approve of the address if certain criteria are met.

verifyPhoneNumber

public boolean verifyPhoneNumber()
This method verifies the user's phone number. Currently, a valid phone number has length 10 after the optional dashes are removed.

Returns:
Boolean whether or not Phone Number entered is valid.

verifyEmail

public boolean verifyEmail()
This method verifies the user's e-mail address. Currently, a valid e-mail contains an @ symbol.

Returns:
Boolean returns true if email contains '@'

verifyPayment

public boolean verifyPayment()
This method verifies the user's payment info. If the credit card option is chosen, payment is set to the credit card number which currently accepts an even number.

Returns:
Boolean returns true if Payment information is properly submitted

submitOrder

public void submitOrder(View view)
This method is run when the user hits the submit order button. It checks whether each of the verifications passed and if one does not, the message is altered and the order is not submitted.

Parameters:
view -

public boolean getUserInputRadio(int idNumber)
Helper method for RadioButton

Parameters:
idNumber - ID number for a given radio button.
Returns:
Boolean true if the radio button is selected.
